item.text: These are the names of the sons of Israel who entered Egypt—each man with his household entered with Jacob:
<st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>, <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>, <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st>, and <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>,
<st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>, and <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>,
<st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> and <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st>, <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st> and <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05315" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> who were <st data-num="03409" class="">directly</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">descended</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> numbered <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st>.<n id="3" /> But <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> already in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>,<n id="4" />

and in time<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st><n id="2" /> and his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01755" class="">generation</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st>.
The Israelites, however, were fruitful, increased greatly, multiplied, and became extremely strong, so that the land was filled with them.
Then a new king, who did not know about Joseph, came to power over Egypt.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look at</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, more <st data-num="07227" class="">numerous</st> and <st data-num="06099" class="">stronger</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> we are!
Come, let’s deal wisely with them. Otherwise they will continue to multiply, and if a war breaks out, they will ally themselves with our enemies and fight against us and leave the country.”
So they put foremen over the Israelites to oppress them with hard labor. As a result they built Pithom and Rameses as store cities for Pharaoh.

But the <st data-num="0834" class="">more</st> the Egyptians<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06031" class="">oppressed</st> them, the <st data-num="03651" class="">more</st> they <st data-num="07235" class="">multiplied</st> and <st data-num="06555" class="">spread</st>.<n id="2" /> As a result the Egyptians <st data-num="06973" class="">loathed</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st>,

and <st data-num="04713" class="">they</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05647">made</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="06531" class="">rigorously</st>.<n id="2" />
They made their lives bitter by hard service with mortar and bricks and by all kinds of service in the fields. Every kind of service the Israelites were required to give was rigorous.
The king of Egypt said to the Hebrew midwives, one of whom was named Shiphrah and the other Puah,

<n id="1" /> “When you <st data-num="03205" class="">assist</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="05680" class="">Hebrew women</st> <st data-num="03205">in childbirth</st>, <st data-num="07200" class="">observe</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="070">delivery</st>:<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> him,<n id="4" /> but <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>, she may <st data-num="02425" class="">live</st>.”<n id="5" />
But the midwives feared God and did not do what the king of Egypt had told them; they let the boys live.
Then the king of Egypt summoned the midwives and said to them, “Why have you done this and let the boys live?”

The <st data-num="03205" class="">midwives</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st>, “<st data-num="03588" class="">Because</st> the <st data-num="05680" class="">Hebrew</st><n id="1" /> women are <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> like the <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptian</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>—<st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="02007" class="">Hebrew women</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="02422" class="">vigorous</st>; <st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">give birth</st> <st data-num="02962" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="03205" class="">midwife</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">gets</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them!”<n id="3" />

So <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">treated</st> the <st data-num="03205" class="">midwives</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">well</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">multiplied</st> and <st data-num="06105">became</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="06105" class="">strong</st>.
And because the midwives feared God, he made households for them.
Then Pharaoh commanded all his people, “All sons that are born you must throw into the river, but all daughters you may let live.”
